---
title: Botulinum Toxin (Botox)
---




# Cerebral Palsy

- Paralytic effect at neuromuscular junction,
inhibits release of acetylcholine
    - gastroc complex for equinus gait
    - Hamstrings for crouch gait
    - Adductors/hamstrings to improve seating
    - Used as diagnostic before surgery (ex: into posterior tib)
    - As analgesic prior to sx to dec pain and spasms
        - (ex: adductors prior to hip reduction sx)
- Phenol/alcohol injections used similarly
